title: How to Make a Smoothie Bonanza

steps.headline: Select a smoothie from the ingredients section.
Prepare your ingredients in the correct portions.
Blend all ingredients in a blender to the desired thickness and texture.
Garnish the smoothie with a mint leaf or intact piece of fruit.
Serve immediately in a tall glass.

text: Select a smoothie from the ingredients section.  Prepare your ingredients in the correct portions.  Blend all ingredients in a blender to the desired thickness and texture.  Garnish the smoothie with a mint leaf or intact piece of fruit.  Serve immediately in a tall glass.  Finished.
